title: Clash: RECRUITING MID** GOLD - PLAT ONLY
body:
Hey filthy animals. Recruiting for a mid laner (Gold-Plat).. for tomorrow’s clash tournament and flex beyond clash. 

Lads you have to be serious but not serious to the point where if we lose you become toxic, don’t like banter... don’t join us. Easily offended, don’t join you filthy dirty rats.

Active on league, discord and in Facebook group chat is a must!

The team will be practicing today @4pm&9-930 pm Aest today. 



Let me know animals.

IGN; Dirty Tip Rat

replies.body: I'm keen to try out I'm plat mid veigar main with 65%+ W/R my IGN is jonathonveigstar
